description: Welcome home to 'Maplewood Creek' in the highly desirable Cottonwood area of Maple Ridge. This family friendly townhome offers 3 bedrooms plus den, 3.5 bathrooms, and is just 2 blocks from Alexander Robinson Elementary School. This thoughtfully designed home enjoys updated hard surface flooring and carpets, a fully refreshed kitchen and all bathrooms also updated. The greenbelt outlook provides peace and serenity, while the spacious home provides ample room for everyone. There's parking for 3 cars (one in large garage and 2 more in driveway). Several outdoor living spaces; covered front porch, rear south facing sundeck overlooking greenbelt and large partially covered patio on ground floor off of family room. This home has everything you have been looking for and is move in ready! CALL NOW
